---
name: Others
about: Only issues regarding the online apt repo service should be put here
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

Only issues regarding the online apt repo service should be put here.

---

For issue on a specific package's usage (kernel, bootloader, overlays, etc), please file under related [radxa-pkg](https://github.com/radxa-pkg) repo.

For issue on a specific product, but you are unsure which package is at fault, please file under related [radxa-build](https://github.com/radxa-build) repo.

For issue on the build system, please file under [rsdk](https://github.com/RadxaOS-SDK/rsdk) repo.
